resources.string: String must consist of a mixture of letters and numerical digits only, with at least one of each.
String must be between 5 and 12 characters in length.
String cannot be empty or white space.
String must not contain any sequence of characters immediately followed by the same sequence.
String must contain only letters and must be between 4 and 16 characters and cannot be empty.
String must contain only digits and cannot be empty.
String must contain only letters and cannot be empty.
String must contain only letters and cannot be empty.
